input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Generalist 2nd shift Temperanceville, VA

Location: Temperanceville, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

Job Description

Applicants will be considered for opening on shift posted. Must be available to work overtime and weekends if required.

General Maintenance positions are responsible for keeping machinery running to maintain continuous production.

You must be willing to set up, adjust and break down production line machinery.

Must be willing to learn Tyson SAP software to make work orders and fill out the daily documentation that is required in the system. Must be able to communicate effectively verbally, orally and in writing regarding the status of equipment and projects.. Must be able to use math as needed to make work related computations for machinery, fluid capacities, etc.Must be willing to lift 70 lbs. on a daily basis and be willing to work on your feet for a period of 12 hours. Must be willing to complete all required training for the job. 

Must have 6 Months of maintenance experience or a maintenance certification from an accredited school.

Must own small hand tools and have a working knowledge of electricity, power, transmissions, plumbing, hydraulics, pneumatics, welding, cutting, and the use of shop tools.

We offer a full range of benefits and perks including:

Medical, dental, and vision insuranceTelehealth servicesWell-Being Support ProgramsFSA and HSA available401kStock Purchase PlanCompany Paid Life InsuranceShort-Term & Long- Term DisabilityFully Funded EducationDiscount Program

Rehire Criteria:

Rehire criteria is a minimum waiting period of 180 days. 

Rehire Rule of no more than 3 times worked at Tyson Foods.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

2ND SHIFT (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None

Completing all required training for the job
